abilities.description: Upgrades an existing ability or adds a new ability to your hero.

additionalInformation: Ability Upgrade has a unique interface on the HUD, with its icon lighting up once the item is consumed.
The item grants each hero unique enhancements to their abilities, sometimes granting a new ability.
The item can be automatically consumed, regardless of purchasing it in the Base Shop or having it delivered via the Courier's Transfer Items, despite having a full inventory on the hero.
name: Aghanim's Shard
description: With origins known only to a single wizard, fragments of this impossible crystal are nearly as coveted as the renowned scepter itself.
trivia: Aghanim's Shard first made its debut in Aghanim's Labyrinth, where they served as upgrades rewarded at the end of each room.
Aghanim's Shard is named after Agahnim, one of the main villains in The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past.
Rubick is the son of Aghanim.
